description:
No matter whether your XC ski routine involves loppets, after work skate sessions or lazy laps around the neighbourhood park, you'll love these soft merino socks. Designed specificially for Nordic skiers, fine-gauge knitting keeps these socks itch-free and allows them to breathe.

  • Made of fine gauge merino wool, nylon and Lycra® that wick moisture but also provides warmth
  • True seamless construction makes them irresistibly comfortable
  • Cushionless, streamlined fit stands up to long days in close-fitting cross country ski boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Lillehammer Lightweight Nordic Boot Socks - Women's
